REPORT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE NEBRASKA 1931 Showing the Condition of the Commercial and Savings Banks, Trust Companies and Building and Loan Associations June 30, 1931
CORNHUSKER-COMMERCIAL PTG. CO. Lincoln, Nebraska

: BUREAU OP BANKING ■ ■ * .■■'•' ' ' ■ ..- ■' - '• ' Lincoln, Nebraska November 9, 1931 Charles W. Bryan, Governor, Executive Offices Lincoln, Nebraska. Dear Sir: We submit herewith for your consideration a report embracing statistical and other information taken from the records of this Depart - ment, concerning the State Banks, Building and Loan Associations and Trust Companies of Nebraska, covering the period from 1890 to June 30, 1931. We also include Statements of State Banks of Nebraska, Building and Loan Associations and Trust Companies as shown by call of June 30, 1931. Respectfully submitted, DEPARTMENT OF TRADE & COMMERCE, •-...- E. H. Luikart, Secretary. ■ • • *
